page.title: 03FRODSHAM MARKET
page.content: A large open market is held every Thursday along Main Street, a tree-lined road. There are over 70 stalls including 27 clothing, 30 household and 14 food stalls.The clothing stalls include 3 selling 'materials'and 7 selling only Denim Jeans.Household stalls include household linen;curtains;pet needs; plants;pottery;brass and wrought iron; electrical goods and tools.Food stalls include 3 greengrocery;fish;sweets and dairy produce. Answers to questions revealed that most people live locally and come every week.Some come occasionally to buy specific items and a few come from other towns,particularly Ellesmere Port,Chester and Runcorn.The fish stall is the most popular,followed by the cheese stall.Stall_holders come from towns and cities a long way away.
